column5: Where exactly are the Barrie docks? Is there adequate parking? What's the lure of choice?  I'd like to try my luck at some perch tomorrow.  Thanks

Hope you live nearby, I walked down there today and there were a lot of disappointed fishermen down there.  I saw about 60 people, talked to a guy from Stoney Creek who had driven up because he had also been reading reports about great fishing (he got skunked...looks like the fish are on the run...or in someone's freezer!)
was there today.   LOOOONG day.   they didnt start biting till around 3:30   lotsa small ones.  the odd group of bigger fish would move in and out.
